tool.name: mtbls520_12_species_nmds
tool.description: Perform NMDS on the data from the MTBLS520 study.
tool.help: This is the MTBLS520 study. The study will be published soon. This code is work-in-progress. Do not redistribute unless study published. Copyright (C) 2017 Kristian Peters - IPB Halle ---- More updates soon
